modName: Vampiric Thirst -A Standalone Follower Mod or A Serana Replacer-
summary: Adds a new follower to Skyrim or a replacer for Serana
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][color=#00ff00][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]Screenshots are using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]Realvision ENB[/url][/font][/size][/color][/i][/center]
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/8122a5444fe432c87c1338521f12b7d1/tumblr_om9qdhNZm31w6d9cko1_1280.png[/img]
[i][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#93c47d][size=4]"That was a good snack. With this, I should be full for a hour. Now where shall I find my main course?" -[/size][size=3]Kiria
[/size]
[/color][/font][/i][center][/center][center][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]REQUIREMENTS[/u][/size][/color][/font]

Dawnguard


[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]RECOMMENDED[/u][/size][/color][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] if you want to see her face more clearly
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url] for more follower functionality
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url] for more follower commentary

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for easy installation
For manual (NOT RECOMMENDED):
Simply extract the files to the main Skyrim directory
[color=#ffff00]ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP OF WHAT YOU'RE OVERWRITING![/color]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]UN-INSTALLATION[/u][/size][/color][/font]

 NMM and MO un-installation is easy.
For manual:
Use your backup to overwrite what was changed or delete the Kiria folders.

[youtube]fC3WlbpFmns[/youtube] 


[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/font][/u]
This mod adds Kiria, a vampire follower. She can be used as a standalone follower or as a replacer for Serana. She comes with a Daedric sword and a vampire outfit, along with some random jewelry. She starts at level 1 and she lvls with the character indefinitely. 

I would love to see screenshots of your adventures with her!

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#76a5af][size=5]STORY[/size][/color][/font][/u][/center][center]
Kiria was born as a half elf nord child. After being kidnapped, Kiria was turned into a vampire at a young age. She was subjected to fear and violence due to her being a new blood. She suffered through the years and eventually turned that fear and violence into a weapon, her weapon. She made her way through the ranks to become a Nightmaster Vampire and was soon welcomed into Harkon's court. Harkon had gathered high ranking vampires and their thralls into a search for his missing daughter. Kiria was the second to find her but, using what she was taught at a young age, quickly took out the competiton and woke Serana up. She guided her to Harkon's court and accepted Harkon's gift and was turned once more into a true vampire, a Vampire Lord. With Serana in tow, Kiria began to see this as an opportunity to overthrow Harkon and take her place as the Queen of Vampires.


I plan to make a Skyrim Machimina involving her and her friend in the near future. If you're interested in this, please be on the lookout on Youtube and the Nexus for when the start to come out.

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]CHARACTERISTICS[/u][/size][/color][/font]

Weight: 100
Body type: CBBE, UNP

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]ABILITIES[/size][/color][/font][/u][u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][/u]
She comes with the spells you can expect to see on a Nightmaster Vampire but due to her being low leveled, she can't use them right away. As she gets stronger, she will become more powerful and will start to use her more powerful spells.

Primary Skills: Light Armor, One handed, Sneak, Destruction

She won't affect your stealth meter.

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]FUTURE PLANS[/u]
[/size][/color][/font]
Custom voice (???)
Quest (???)
Make an episodic series involving her and her relations

[font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5][u]Q & A[/u]
[/size][/color][/font]
Q: Where is she located?
A: She is at Falkreath's Dead Man's Drink

Q: What body is she using?
A: CBBE (More specifically using a bodyslide I made)

Q: Any other body types than CBBE?
A: At this time, no. I primarily use the CBBE as there are more mods for it. If enough demand for it, I may consider it.
[b]
[/b]Q: Can I have her hand in marriage?
A: While it pains me to give away my daughter, I will approve it. (I.E. Yes, yes she is. lol)

[b]Q: Where can I see more of her?[/b]
[b]A: Keep an eye out on youtube or the Nexus video page for more.[/b]

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]Optional[/size][/color][/font][/u]

[b]I also made a file where it adds her as a Nightmaster Vampire to a vampire cave. She is a very high level enemy (recommended level 70) and is surrounded by other vampires.[/b]
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/8d302e2f9d395e1db79c79b6175b17d4/tumblr_omazjg8i5p1w6d9cko1_1280.png[/img]

[u][size=3]Please let me know if there is any lack of mentioning in credits.[/size]
[size=3]Thank you very much, great modders!![/size]

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]TUTORIALS CONSULTED[/size]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xcHw4sqrrx8]
[size=2]Tutorial: Make any Character a Standalone Follower[/size][/url][/color][/font][/u][/u] by Skyla

[u][font=Times New Roman][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color][/font][/u]

If someone wants to her use as a part of something else, please come to me and ask first. I am happy to see her being used but I would like to know what for first before I will give permission.[/center]
author: KillagameVII
